about_the_game:
Your journey lies ahead - It all begins with a simple tap to the funky beat of RhythmMMO!



In a world befallen by tragedy, the only way to restore happiness is to dig and fight to the beat. Welcome to RhythmMMO, a world filled with funky beats and bittersweet tales, where a continuous stream of music guides your every move.

This massively multiplayer genre mashup combines the open nature and creativity of sandbox games with the exhilarating pace-keeping of rhythm games. Every action you take will require staying in lockstep with the music’s tempo. Whether you need to dig for treasure and resources or approach and attack foes, your ability to stay in the flow will be key to unlocking the secrets of this world and restoring balance.

Engage with the three factions of the Bermuda Triangle, each with its own motivations and influences. Explore a world where magic and technology both blend and clash. Master pulsating rhythms as you take on the gods themselves.

Features:



Groove to the beat
Experience exciting rhythm gameplay that will keep you on your toes as you hit the beats with precision and style.


Forge your fate
Unleash your creativity with a robust crafting system that allows you to forge powerful items and create unique treasures.


Express your creativity
Shape the world to your liking with sandbox terrain destruction, where you can carve, dig, and mold the environment to suit your desires.


Build your home
Build your dream home and decorate it to perfection, creating a cozy and personalized sanctuary.


Restore balance
Engage in challenging gameplay as you cancel anomalies to restore creatures and objects back to their normal state, fostering a wholesome and caring atmosphere.


Get Cozy
Dive into adorable and charming graphics filled with cute animals and larger-than-life creatures, all while enjoying a forgiving and wholesome gameplay experience.


Unveil the truth
Immerse yourself in a captivating main storyline that delves into the dynamic between nature and nurture, posing thought-provoking questions along the way.


Personalize your character
Show off your unique style with options that allow you to customize your gear, clothes, and appearance to your heart's content.


Design your own items
Express your creativity further by designing custom items, from gear to furniture, within the game, making your mark on the world with your own creations.


Choose your path
Choose from the three faction classes of the Ternion, each offering distinct playstyles and motivations, adding depth and variety to your gameplay experience.
